Test Name: 2-Hydroxyglutaric Acid, Glutaric Acid, Ethylmalonic Acid, and Methylsuccinic Acid (Plasma)
Purpose: To accurately quantify 2-hydroxyglutaric acid, glutaric acid, ethylmalonic acid, and methylsuccinic acid in plasma for clinical diagnostics and patient care.
Equipment: High-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) system, refrigerated centrifuge, pipettes, analytical balance
